meanings: go play in a mountain stream
an iron bridge spanning the valley

vlive.korean: 계곡이 뭐야? What's a valley? 듣기 View video NCT : 시티고 1학년 27반
뭐야, 산이었어? - 계곡? What? A mountain? - The valley? 듣기 View video NCT : 시티고 1학년 27반
여름 여행... 계곡 아닐까요? Summer vacation... Probably somewhere by a stream in the mountains? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 긋밤☕️
vlive.english: Summer vacation... Probably somewhere by a stream in the mountains?

vlive.korean: 계곡 - 계곡! A valley. - A valley! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 히짱데이🥳💕
다 좋은데 계곡? I like them all but valley? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 안녕 몬베베🐢
vlive.english: I like them all but valley?

examples.korean: The track plunged down into the valley. 발음듣기 그 산길은 계곡 아래로 가파르게 나 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The track plunged down into the valley. 발음

examples.korean: The fog soon encompassed the whole valley. 발음듣기 안개가 곧 계곡 전체를 에워쌌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fog soon encompassed the whole valley. 발음

examples.korean: The valley is watered by a stream. 발음듣기 그 계곡에는 개울물이 흘러들어와서 물을 채운다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The valley is watered by a stream. 발음

examples.korean: The valley was clothed in trees and shrubs. 발음듣기 그 계곡에는 나무와 관목들이 우거져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The valley was clothed in trees and shrubs. 발음

examples.korean: At the other side of the valley was a steep ascent to the top of the hill. 발음듣기 계곡 건너편에는 가파른 오르막이 산꼭대기까지 나 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At the other side of the valley was a steep ascent to the top of the hill. 발음
